data.title: Weather at Leipzig Halle Airport (LEJ): Weather and Climate in Leipzig Area, Germany
meta_keywords: leipzig features continental climate saxony region eastern side germany biggest city whole state leipzig offers typically germany weather warm often hot summer days cold winters summer climate averages around 22c / 72f june september temperatures more than 25c
data.meta_description: Leipzig features a continental climate in the Saxony region, on the eastern side of Germany.  The biggest city in the whole of the state, Leipzig offers typically Germany weather, with warm and often hot summer days and cold winters.  The summer climate averages around 22C / 72F from June to September, with temperatures of more than 25C / 77F not being unusual.
